FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

how much does it cost?

Our prices are personalized to all our customers.

how can i contact you?

You can contact us on contact@stratusagency.io, else on our LinkedIn page. It would be a pleasure to work with you!

how many revisions per project?

We give you 2 revisions per project. Beyond this capacity, the following revisions will be charged.

how long will it take to receive my project?

This will depend on your specifications and the urgency for your project.
